text:
#Ridge - Why didn't the UK impose more restrictions on people coming into the country? 

Grant shapps - Once #coronavirus is prevalent in the country then there's not much point. 

#Ridge - Why didn't we put restrictions in before it was prevalent then? 

#Marr https://t.co/OxiZ3rDS2Q
